title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a brothel in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams when seeing a brothel A brothel is considered one of the suspicious places where fornication and alcohol are practiced between women and men, and seeing it in a dream causes the dreamer to worry, which makes him search for an interpretation of that. The dream and the dream can contain many details that need interpretation. The interpretation of a brothel differs according to the dreamer's social status, and the interpretation of the dream of seeing brothels in a dream has good and bad connotations, and we will talk about them together in detail. Interpretation of a dream of seeing a brothel in a dream Seeing a brothel in a dream has many interpretations and connotations, such as: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream may mean that she fears the future and is thinking about marriage. However, if an unmarried woman sees herself entering a brothel and committing adultery, this indicates her marriage to a person of ill repute. However, if the woman is married and sees adultery, this indicates her bad reputation and her husband's problems. If she sees herself entering a brothel, this is because of her fear and thinking about future issues. However, if a married woman seduces her husband in a dream, this indicates that there are problems between them that may lead to divorce. If the dreamer is a man and sees himself entering a brothel, this indicates that he has committed Sins. If a man gets married and sees himself committing adultery, this is a sign of his bad psychological state. If the man is single, this indicates that he is thinking about marriage and settling down in his life. If the dreamer is a student and sees a brothel, this indicates his failure, and that he cannot bear the difficult responsibility. Or it may indicate that the dreamer depends on women in life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the sea in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Interpretation of a dream about night girls Seeing adultery in a dream means that there are many problems and disputes for the dreamer, and among its indications are also: If he finds himself committing adultery, this is a sign of bad reputation. As for a married woman, if she sees herself committing adultery in her dream, this indicates her envy from some people. If a person is pious in the dream and sees adultery in his dream, this is evidence of his closeness to God and his abandonment of his sins and disobedience. It can also indicate that he can go to Hajj. If the dreamer is a merchant and sees himself committing adultery in a dream from a close woman, this indicates his profit from his trade. See also: Interpretation of a dream about anger between spouses in Dream of Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of escaping from shameful behavior If a man sees himself refusing to commit adultery with a woman, it is one of the commendable things and his worries and problems will go away. However, if the owner of the vision is a woman and refuses to commit adultery, this is a sign of her presence. She is pressures in her life and is trying to escape from them, this is evidence of her faith in her husband and her love for him, and it also shows her purity, and if the woman is single and sees herself refusing him, this is evidence. Of her purity and good morals. See also: Interpretation of a dream of a sister giving birth to a girl in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of dreams of seeing brothels There are many interpretations related to seeing adultery in a dream, such as: This may indicate the imminent marriage of the visionary and stability. Or its practice may indicate that you are getting closer to God

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about an abaya for single people

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a single woman: Girls love to wear the abaya on some occasions and also go out and walk because of its many colors and attractive appearance. Sometimes the abaya appears to a girl in a dream and it has many meanings, the most important of which is that it indicates modesty. And coverage, and we present in the following details the most important interpretations of a dream about an abaya for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a single woman: A dream about an abaya is interpreted by experts with happy connotations, so a girl should be very happy if she sees a beautiful abaya, especially if it is small, as it is a good omen for many matters related to her life. Emotional or religious. She is expected to get married and become more religious and worship more. A lot of goodness and blessings prevail in the life of an unmarried woman when she sees the loose abaya in a dream, especially when she wears it and finds it beautiful and has a distinctive color. The dream also indicates that she carries many of her prayers. And abstain from temptation and evil, so her next life will be full of joy. The Asrar dream interpretation website is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is type the Asrar Dream Interpretation website in Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin says that an unmarried woman seeing an abaya in a dream is evidence of her commitment to religion and covering herself, and that she does not neglect this matter at all, and if the abaya that The girl wears it beautiful and loose, as it is an auspicious sign of marriage soon. Once the abaya appears in a girl’s dream, its good meanings multiply and tell her that she is psychologically fine and in good health. However, if she loses this abaya, this indicates serious obstacles and crises that will fall under her control. And if he finds them again, beautiful events and calm return to their reality. Interpretation of a dream about an abaya for a single woman by Ibn Shaheen. When a girl is seen wearing the abaya, Ibn Shaheen says that there are good surprises that will appear for her in the future because she is of good character and has virtuous morals, so she does not harm others and does not hold grudges against people. Around her, but rather follow the beautiful path in life and never violate God’s commandments. Ibn Shaheen believes that the appearance of the black abaya in a dream is one of the sure symbols that the girl is trying to get closer to her Creator and increase her obedience and the good deeds that she performs. Therefore, if she commits an evil and sinful act, she is quick to leave it and wants to please her Lord again. Interpretation of a dream about a new abaya for a single woman: It can be said that seeing a new abaya in a dream for a girl is a happy symbol, because its beautiful shape has special considerations. Legalists say that she is close to peaceful events and full of good luck and luck, even if she is waiting for some good news, they pray to her urgently, in addition, the girl's new abaya is a sign. Obtaining a new job or working on a special project that provides her with the income she needs to achieve stability in her financial affairs. Interpretation of a dream about wearing the abaya and niqab for a single woman. Some experts confirm that wearing the abaya in a dream for an unmarried woman with the niqab is...

title: What is the interpretation of seeing receiving money in a dream?

preview.html: In this article, we will point out the interpretation of seeing you taking money in a dream. Many of us dream that we are taking money from someone, and the interpretation of each of our dreams varies according to the details of the dream and the owner. And through the following lines in the encyclopedia, we will show you the most important interpretation of receiving money in a dream. Interpretation of seeing money in a dream. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream about receiving money. Ibn Sirin believes that if a person dreams that he is taking money from someone, this is a sign of how close he is to this person and his love. Him. Whoever sees that he is receiving wrapped money, his dream indicates that he will soon receive a lot of money. A dream about receiving a lot of money from an unknown person indicates that the dreamer is deceiving those around him and pretending to be with them. When someone sees that he has taken a piece of money, This vision is good news that his wife will become pregnant. Whoever dreams of receiving money that he does not need, this means that he does not want zakat or zakat, and it may indicate that he will face many problems. Interpretation of receiving money in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi says that the vision of receiving a banknote indicates that the fortuneteller is He is about to give birth to a boy. Whoever dreams that he received a bunch of banknotes, the dream indicates that he will be exposed to problems and diseases. This vision also indicates that the dreamer hears words that bother him and cause him severe anxiety. If a person dreams of taking notes from someone, this symbolizes That this person is famous for hypocrisy and lying and that he uses lies and laughter to attract others. Interpretation of seeing a single woman receiving money in a dream: A single woman receiving money in a dream indicates that there is a large inheritance on her way. Seeing an unmarried woman receiving coins indicates the presence of difficulties and problems She will face it in her life. A dream about a single woman getting a lot of money from someone indicates that she will soon marry a rich man. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman getting money: Receiving money in a dream for a married woman symbolizes her happiness in life. But if she sees that she is getting Silver money, this is good news that she will give birth to a girl. Anyone who dreams that she obtained insurance from her husband shows you that she will become pregnant. Obtaining coins in a married woman’s dream indicates the seriousness of her fears. Among the dreams predicted is that a married woman takes money in order to borrow, because This means that she will lose her husband. Interpretation of getting money in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of taking coins from her husband, the dream indicates that she will give birth to a baby girl. But if she gets gold from him, this means that she will give birth to a boy. Another dream interpretation in the Encyclopedia , you can use the Live Dream Interpretation application.

title: Interpretation of nosebleeds in a dream for unmarried and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of blood coming from the nose in a dream for a single, married, or pregnant woman. To see blood bleeding from the nose in a dream on the hand indicates many indications and meanings in the dreamer’s life, which may or may not be affected in the dream interpretation, as confirmed by dream interpretation experts who believe that the interpretation of dreams It is a matter of discretion, and below we will learn about the most important interpretations of dreams and their possible meanings in the following lines. Follow us.Interpretation of nosebleeds in a dreamWe will tell you through the following pointsInterpretation of nosebleeds in a dream:If the dreamer sees blood coming out of the nose and its color is red and transparent, the dream may indicate goodness and blessings in the dreamer’s life.Seeing blood from the nose in a dream sometimes means hearing good news And the happy news that the dreamer hears. If the dreamer sees blood flowing from his nose, but it is only a little blood, then the dream may indicate illicit profits and suspicious money in the dreamer’s life. A nosebleed in a dream can mean, in some interpretations, sins, disobedience, and straying from one’s path. Religion and integrity. If the dreamer sees blood coming out of one side of his nose but not the other, then the dream indicates that he will overcome the problems and difficulties he is facing in his life at the present time. Dreaming of a nosebleed on one side of the nose portends the cessation of stress and anxiety and the return of comfort to the dreamer’s life. And his relationship with those around him. Seeing the dreamer with thick blood coming out of his nose, the dream may indicate the anguish and distress that the dreamer will feel in his life as he tries to overcome the problem and escape from its consequences. If a woman sees a nosebleed in a dream and it is actually during her menstrual period, it may indicate The dream indicates the collapse of worries and problems that disturb a woman’s mind and mind. Interpretation of a nosebleed in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl who sees a dream about a nosebleed in a dream. The dream can indicate many meanings and interpretations in the girl’s life, and the most important of these interpretations can be identified as follows: When a girl sees a lot of blood coming out of her nose in her dream, the dream may indicate that the girl is facing some difficulties and problems at the present time. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that a lot of blood is coming out of her nose and staining her clothes, then the dream indicates anxiety, sadness, and feeling... By being unable to face reality. The blood that flows from an unmarried girl’s nose, which falls on the ground, may mean that the girl will commit some sins and acts of disobedience, and she must hasten to repent and return to the path of truth and religion. Transparent red blood in a dream often indicates Getting rid of the problems that the girl will soon face in her life. Sometimes a dream indicates that you hear good news that will bring joy and pleasure to the girl in her reality. The presence of small, transparent blood from the girl’s nose may indicate marriage in the near future and contact with the person the girl loves. The female student who sees blood bleeding From her nose in a dream, and the blood is red and not thick, is the best evidence of...

title: Learn about the 26 most important interpretations of seeing a dream about a hug by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Dreaming of hugging him in a dream and the interpretation of his vision. There are many manifestations of love through which we can express the beautiful feelings within us, and hugging is one of those manifestations. Hugs in a dream are beautiful visions, and most of their interpretations are happy. Through an Egyptian website, you will learn about the interpretations of great translators such as Sheikh Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Follow the following to find an interpretation of your vision.Hugs in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a hug means the love and desire that the dreamer feels for some people in his life.Al-Nabulsi interpreted the hug in a dream and said It indicates the social interaction and mingling that will occur between the dreamer and the person he is embracing in the dream. Only if this confirms that both of them will get to know each other and that the interaction between them will be short-lived and does not last long, but if he saw that he hugged one of them and the hug remained for a long time in the dream then this vision means that the fortuneteller will deal with this person, and there will be a long acquaintance between them and it may It continues for many years. This vision in a woman’s dream shows how much she loves the pleasures of this world and works to satisfy all her desires in all possible ways, whether they are halal or haram. This vision means that the dreamer does not desire the afterlife and does not want it. I wish to accept the idea that life will inevitably end one day, so this dream has an interpretation. It is important that the vision has little faith and its love for our Lord is very weak. Whoever loves his Lord with true love will be happy on the day of his vision, and will not be afraid of judgment because he will be eligible for it. This is with good deeds, prayers, offerings to the needy and other religious deeds to be performed. Some interpreters said that this dream in the dream has a different meaning, that is, the dreamer will be from the same social and cultural class present in the dream, and this means that the hug will be interpreted that both Of the hugging guardian and guardian they will be similar in many things in their lives. If the dreamer sees that he is embracing someone he loves who is missing from him, this confirms that he will soon receive this beloved, and the person who already has a brother is about to travel abroad and dreams that he is hugging him tightly. This vision suggests that the dreamer will soon bid farewell to his brother due to his departure from the homeland. When the dreamer dreams that he is embracing someone he knows, but he feels pain and sadness while embracing him, then this vision is not good and confirms that the two parties will separate from each other if the woman is unmarried and engaged and sees her embracing him with her fiancé. Then the interpretation of the dream explains their separation, and if a married woman sees this vision and hugs her husband, this may indicate her divorce from him, and if the friend sees her with his friend, then their friendship will be interpreted. Finally, the separation between them is inevitable, as separation has types, it can be fighting, travel, and death, and each type is determined by the circumstances of the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of an intense hug in a dream: Seeing an embrace in a dream if it is accompanied by tears and crying, then this vision will translate positively that anxiety has not increased His days in the life of the situation

title: Interpretation of stolen gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin It is considered one of the unpleasant visions, as mentioned in most scholars’ interpretations. It is one of the dreams that tells about the condition of the viewer who is far from his Lord and commits sins, and its interpretations vary according to the condition of the observer, so they explained its meanings. We.Interpretation of a dream about stealing gold in a dream. Ibn Sirin said in what was narrated about him: Stealing gold in a dream is an indication that the dreamer has lost a high position among the people because he committed dishonorable acts that were not expected of him. This causes him to lose his position among the people, and he flees from them, so he should pay attention and monitor what he does. So that he does not regret it. See the dreamer herself. He stole the gold. It indicates the fortuneteller’s constant fear and anxiety for many reasons in real life. title: Interpretation of seeing a corpse wrapped in white in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a corpse wrapped in white in a dream for a single woman. The shroud is the special covering that covers the dead with which they are covered before being buried in the grave. It is good or bad. Psychologists believe that the vision has many meanings, and in this article we look together at the most important things that have been said. For this vision. Interpretation of seeing a corpse wrapped in white in a dream for a single woman. Scientists believe that if an unmarried girl sees that there is a corpse wrapped in white in a dream, it indicates that she is living a romantic life with a young man, but it does not suit her. And if the dreamer sees her engaged to a person of good character, he sees that There is a corpse wrapped in white in a dream, this means that she will divorce him because of her bad reputation. If the dreamer sees in a dream a corpse wrapped in white in the reception room, this means that there is a malicious and unrighteous person who wants to approach her and she must beware of him. And when the dreamer sees that it was wrapped in white White in a dream, this indicates that she will enter a new life full of happiness and stability, and she may get married soon. Seeing a mite wrapped in white in a dreamer’s dream may mean that he knows a weak character and around him are many bad friends who want to do bad things that lead to evil. When he sees The fortune teller sees the body wrapped in white, but she is afraid of it, as this indicates that she is pure and pious and has turned away from God and shunned from desires. Seeing the sleeping body of someone she knows wrapped in white in a dream means that he needs someone to support him in returning to guidance and abandoning sins and abominations. Secrets of dream interpretation includes The expert has teamed up with a team of the best interpreters of dreams and visions in the country. The website is in Arabic. To access it, write a page on the Internet Secrets of Dream Interpretation on Google. Interpretation of seeing a corpse wrapped in white in a dream for an unmarried woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the dreamer’s vision of a corpse wrapped in white in a dream indicates the extent of her failure in life and that she has no goal in life, which exposes her to difficulties. And problems. If the dreamer sees that there is a corpse in a dream wrapped in white, this means that he is committing a lot of immorality and sins and is not ashamed of what he does. The scholar Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a corpse wrapped in white in an unmarried woman’s dream means that she will soon marry an unmarried person. Righteous and immoral, and you will live with him in misery. Interpretation of seeing a dead person wrapped in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl, if she sees in her dream that there is a dead person wrapped in front of her, this means that she is inclined to desires and likes to do many things that do not violate the law. And if the dreamer is wrapped Dead in a dream, this means that he will get rid of the forbidden money that he obtained. Interpretation of a dream about a person wrapped in white while he is alive for one person: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a living person wrapped in a dream indicates the loss of a loved one after his death. This indicates that he will be exposed to some calamities and diseases, and God knows best. Seeing a person wrapped in a dream is bitter

title: Interpretation of seeing advice in a dream, comprehensive interpretation of advice

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing advice in a dream is the comprehensive interpretation of advice. Every person needs advice from the people around him. Each individual lives his life in a way, in details, and in situations different from others, and obtaining advice from people who have gone through other situations that the person has not passed or is going through in a different way yet, which It gives him more life experience and the ability to overcome difficult situations and make the right decisions. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing advice in a dream and comprehensive. Interpretation of advice. Interpretation of a dream about seeing advice in a dream. Below we learn about the interpretation of seeing advice in a dream. There are many people who are confused in interpreting their dreams, wondering about their meaning and importance, fearing evil, contemplating goodness, and being alert to warnings. . And then we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing advice in a dream. If people differ among themselves in the interpretation of advice, it is a reflection on the fortuneteller or advisor, or it has another meaning, we will find out in detail below: Advice in a dream portends goodness and is considered a benign and blessed vision. Advice in a dream symbolizes the guide’s love for the dreamer, and his willingness to always be good. Advice In a dream, it is a sign of great love and friendship. Advice from a friend in a dream symbolizes the depth of friendship and the extent of love between two people. It is also considered a vision of harmony and love between friends, especially if the advice is positive. Interpretation of a dream about seeing advice in a dream Advice in a dream is a sign that someone loves the dreamer and wishes him well. According to the interpretation of the great scholar and translator Ibn Sirin, advice comes according to the personality of the advisor, that is, if Someone giving you good advice in a dream is evidence that he is a good person who wishes you well. Success and well, while people advise, this is evidence that he is malicious and evil. Seeing that someone advises the dreamer to do something good and knows that it is a great good, as much as the dreamer loves and wishes him happiness, this is a good sign that the friendship will continue and the friendship and love will remain. Advising the enemy in a dream symbolizes enmity and evil in the heart of the reproach. Wrong and incorrect advice to relatives and friends indicates that there is evil in the heart of the advisor in the dream, and it also shows that the person is only pretending to be in love. Interpretation of a dream of giving advice in a dream. Seeing a father’s advice symbolizes That there are things that the fortuneteller must do. Ignoring parental advice in a dream symbolizes disobedience to parents and failure to adhere to appropriate matters. Whoever sees in a dream that his teacher advises him, this is evidence that it may be a sign that he must pay attention to his lessons, pay attention to studying, and put the game aside. This may show his trust in the fortune teller. the teacher. Giving advice to others in a dream indicates wisdom, intelligence, love for others, and concern for the interests of others. If a priest receives advice in a dream, it means that he is confused in thought and unable to make accurate and confident decisions in his real life, and giving advice to others indicates that the priest is distinguished by intelligence. Love to help and give. Support others.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing reading and hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream in detail

preview.html: Surah Al-Asr in a dream is one of the dreams that many people see in a dream, and it makes the dreamer feel fearful and anxious about this dream, and a great curiosity arises in him to know its interpretation and meaning. The vision and whether this vision appears good or bad, and this we will know through this article. Reading Surat Al-Nasr is evidence of victory over enemies and almost comfort because it indicates the end of worry and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream for a single woman if an unmarried girl sees herself reading Surat Al-Asr in a dream, it means that this girl is committing some sins and transgressions. If an unmarried girl sees Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this means that that girl will be blessed with good and poor, and that God Almighty will relieve her of all the problems and crises that she suffers from in her life. Read also Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Saffat in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream about a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams of reading Surat Al-Asr, this means that this woman lives with her husband in a happy and stable life and that she desires to achieve many goals and aspirations in her life. And she will be able to achieve it. For them. And a pregnant woman seeing Surat Al-Asr in a dream makes her feel safe and close to giving birth, and her birth will be easy and smooth, and she and her fetus will be in good health. Interpretation of the dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream by Ibn Sirin In the opinion of Ibn Sirin, if a person sees himself reading Surat Al-Asr in a dream This means that the owner of this dream faces many problems, obstacles and difficulties. He has undertaken a project or trade and has suffered a great loss, but this loss will come to him after a great success and this will leave difficulties and obstacles. If one sees Surah Al-Asr in a dream, this means that this person is far from Sin, and in this dream it warns him to draw closer to God and perform all the duties of prayer regularly so that he can live a happy and stable life. Read also: Interpretation of a dream of seeing reading Surat Al-Qadr in a dreamInterpretation of a dream of seeing or hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream that she She reads Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this means that this woman faces many worries, difficulties and sorrows, and after this dream she will overcome all these difficulties and obstacles. If a married woman dreams that she reads Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this means that this woman lives with her husband in a stable and peaceful life. All those difficulties and problems that you suffer from will disappear and you will be victorious. Over enemies and achieving many successes in her life. Interpretation of a dream about seeing or hearing Surat Al-Asr in a dream about a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams of reading Surat Al-Asr, this means that this woman has evil people around her who want to harm her, but she will be victorious over all these enemies and that God will guide her in her life. If she sees that she is listening to Surat Al-Asr in a dream, this indicates that this woman will resolve matters between her and her husband, and she will live a happy, calm, and stable life. She will achieve great success in her life, and all problems will be removed.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a well in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a well in a dream: Whoever sees in his dream that he is drinking from a well and taking water from it, this indicates his psychological state and his satisfaction with all his desires. Whoever sees in a dream that the well is pure, this clearly indicates a bright future, success, and many achievements. Entering the well below, this indicates commitment The dreamer has a certain style required to achieve his message. Falling into a well in a dream indicates the desperate situation of the dreamer, who needs calm and reassurance. Whoever sees in a dream that the well is empty, this indicates that the dreamer does not trust those close to him. Pumping water into the well is a sign of goodness and happiness. And the comfort that will come to the dreamer, fulfilling all his hopes and dreams, and getting rid of all his problems and worries. A dream about a well and its various interpretations. Who knows that the well is closed? It indicates that there is someone who is lying to you and changing reality. You must stay away from him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is emerging from a well filled with water This is a sign of goodness and wealth, and earning a lot of money from a lawful source. Who dreams that someone is digging a well? This person is a liar of water. Whoever sees in his dream people coming out of the well or helping people get out of the well, this indicates that the owner The dream is of a good person who gets people out of their crises and succeeds in his mission. Seeing a flood coming out of a well in a dream indicates the goodness, blessing, and abundance of food that prevails over the dreamer. Whoever sees in his dream that the well is drying up of water indicates a feeling of distress and boredom towards the work he is doing. Vision The well in a dream and its interpretation. Interpreters interpreted seeing a well in a dream as the dreamer who enjoys physical health and a calm and good emotional life. Whoever dreams of being in a well, this shows your psychological state and surrenders to the difficulties and difficulties that you are experiencing. Standing in front of a well in a dream indicates that you will go through stages of despair. And fatigue and hardship, but it will end with happiness and joy. Playing around the well indicates happiness, increased activity, movement and pleasure for the dreamer. Drinking water from the well is characterized by purity, which symbolizes a strong relationship with people close to you and the presence of mutual trust between you. Seeing your reflection in the well indicates a sign of the evil of the market, Such as death, anguish, or extreme sadness. Therefore, we have provided you with the interpretation of seeing a well in a dream in all its cases. Anyone who has a vision and wants to interpret it, we receive your comments at the end of the article and we will provide you with the interpretation as soon as possible.
